name: pdf-depersonalization-in-web
description: Веб-приложение для загрузки PDF, рисования поверх его страниц и сохранения результата.

scripts.set-version: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./package.json')); const newVersion=process.argv[1]; console.log(newVersion); if(newVersion){pkg.version=newVersion; fs.writeFileSync('./package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2)); console.log('version set: ' + newVersion); }" && git add package.json && git commit -m "Update version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git tag $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')
scripts.docker-build: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const version=pkg.version; require('child_process').execSync(`echo docker build -t daenur/pdf-depersonalization-in-web:latest -t daenur/pdf-depersonalization-in-web:${version} .`, {stdio: 'inherit'})"
scripts.docker-push: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const version=pkg.version; require('child_process').execSync(`echo docker push daenur/pdf-depersonalization-in-web:latest && docker push daenur/pdf-depersonalization-in-web:${version}`, {stdio: 'inherit'})"
